text:
Shirley Deane (born Shirley Deane Blattenberger; March 16, 1913 – April 26, 1983) was an American actress.
Her parents were Jesse H. Blattenberger and Zola Blattenberger (unmarried name Redden). Deane's maternal grandmother raised her.
She was best known as an actress for playing "Bonnie Jones" in 20th Century Fox's Jones Family series of movies.
